about_me.des: I am a Computer Science student at the University of York. I am currently in my 2nd year and am expecting to graduate in June 2018.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.TWC_des: The White Company is a luxury clothing, bedding and home decor company - Worked in the annual 2 day clearance sale helping with the home decor and furniture.
career.nestle_des: Working with the Engineering team on a data anaylsis tool. Writing VBA scripts macros with excel.
career.MJF_des:
The Montreux Jazz Festival is one of the most famous and iconic jazz festivals in the world.
- Worked on a large team responsible for festival bracelets.
- Worked with the same team for 4 years from 2012 -2015.
career.nestlePTC_des:
Nestlé PTC York (Product Technology Centre) are in charge of research in chocolate, confectionery and biscuits. Worked in the IT department on the following tasks: - Full virtual audit of 400+ IT Assets
- Built and configured various laptops / desktops
- Resolved user faults as requested
- Created a video for informing users how to use “Clickshare” the laptop wireless presentation solution
career.college_des: In July 2014 I graduated from High School, specializing in Maths and Physics with an major in Computer Science.
